verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦٓ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِۦٓ</tajweed> أَنْ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13946'>نذ</tajweed>ِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':1346'>ن ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':1347'>بْ</tajweed>لِ أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4887'>َن ي</tajweed>َأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innā arsalnā nūḥan ilā qaumihī an anżir qaumaka min qabli ay ya'tiyahum 'ażābun alīm(un).
verses.translation: Послали Нуха Мы к его народу: "Ты свой народ увещевай, Пока к ним не пришла мучительная кара

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ إِنِّى لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ يَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>قَوْمِ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى لَكُمْ نَذِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':5164'>رٌ م</tajweed>ُّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla yā qaumi innī lakum nażīrum mubīn(un).
verses.translation: Он им сказал: "О мой народ! Я - увещатель ваш, Кто с ясной (миссией к вам послан)

verses.text_uthmani: أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3899'>ٱ</tajweed>عْبُدُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3704'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهَ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4181'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ani'budullāha wattaqūhu wa aṭī'ūn(i).
verses.translation: Чтоб поклонялись вы Аллаху, И Божьего страшились гнева, И, повинуясь, слушали меня

verses.text_uthmani: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَغْفِرْ لَك<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':556'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':7063'>ن ذ</tajweed>ُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أَجَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':1657'>لٍ م</tajweed>ُّسَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>ًى‌ۚ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ أَجَلَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':10285'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ إِذَا ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ‌ۖ لَوْ كُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ تَعْلَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yagfir lakum min żunūbikum wa yu'akhkhirkum ilā ajalim musammā(n), inna ajalallāhi iżā jā'a lā yu'akhkhar(u), lau kuntum ta'lamūn(a).
verses.translation: Тогда простит Он ваши прегрешенья И даст отсрочку вам (в сей жизни) До срока, что назначен Им. Поистине, когда сей срок придет, Его отсрочить невозможно. О, если бы вы знали это

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِى لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ رَبِّ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِى لَيْل<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13947'>اً و</tajweed>َنَهَارًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla rabbi innī da'atu qaumī lailaw wa nahārā(n).
verses.translation: И (Нух) сказал: "О мой Господь! Я звал к Тебе народ свой днем и ночью

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَآءِىٓ إِلَّا فِرَارًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَمْ يَزِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13948'>دْ</tajweed>هُمْ دُع<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓء<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> إِلَّا فِرَارًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falam yazidhum du'ā'ī illā firārā(n).
verses.translation: Но мой призыв лишь дальше удалил их (от Тебя)

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنِّى كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوٓا۟ أَصَـٰبِعَهُمْ فِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَٱسْتَغْشَوْا۟ ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا۟ وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ ٱسْتِكْبَارًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَصَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِعَهُمْ ف<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13949'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَغْشَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3326'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَكْبَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13950'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتِكْبَارًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa innī kullamā da'autuhum litagfira lahum ja'alū aṣābi'ahum fī āżānihim wastagsyau ṡiyābahum wa aṣarrū wastakbarustikbārā(n).
verses.translation: И всякий раз, когда я к ним взывал, Чтоб мог Ты им грехи простить, Они втыкали пальцы в уши, В одежды (плотно) закрывались, Упорствуя (в грехах) с надменною гордыней

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ṡumma innī da'autuhum jihārā(n).
verses.translation: Но и тогда я их открыто призывал

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ إِنِّىٓ أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَعْلَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13951'>نت</tajweed>ُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ṡumma innī a'lantu lahum wa asrartu lahum isrārā(n).
verses.translation: Затем я обращался к ним на людях И тайно (в личных разговорах)

verses.text_uthmani: فَقُلْتُ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَقُلْتُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13952'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَغْفِرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> رَبَّكُمْ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> كَانَ غَفَّارًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Faqultustagfirū rabbakum innahū kāna gaffārā(n).
verses.translation: Я (им) сказал: "Молите вашего Владыку о прощенье, - Ведь всепрощающ Он

verses.text_uthmani: يُرْسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يُرْسِلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':6377'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ عَلَيْك<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':6378'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':3932'>دْ</tajweed>رَارًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yursilis-samā'a 'alaikum midrārā(n).
verses.translation: Он (с неба) вам обильный дождь пошлет

verses.text_uthmani: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَٰلٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَـٰرًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَيُمْدِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13953'>دْ</tajweed>ك<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':13954'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِأَمْو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':7671'>لٍ و</tajweed>َبَنِينَ وَيَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9574'>جْ</tajweed>عَل لَّكُمْ جَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13955'>تٍ و</tajweed>َيَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':9574'>جْ</tajweed>عَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa yumdidkum bi'amwāliw wa banīna wa yaj'al lakum jannātiw wa yaj'al lakum anhārā(n).
verses.translation: И увеличит ваше достоянье, И ниспошлет вам больше сыновей, Сады устроит и обильно реки изольет

verses.text_uthmani: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Mā lakum lā tarjūna lillāhi waqārā(n).
verses.translation: Что же не чтите вы величия Аллаха Достойным почитаньем

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':387'>دْ</tajweed> خَلَقَكُمْ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13956'>طْ</tajweed>وَارًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qad khalaqakum aṭwārā(n).
verses.translation: Ведь Он (назначил очередность) вам Различных стадий сотворенья

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا۟ كَيْفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍ طِبَاقًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَلَمْ تَرَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> كَيْفَ خَلَقَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1272'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ سَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':158'>بْ</tajweed>عَ سَمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13760'>تٍ ط</tajweed>ِبَاقًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Alam tara kaifa khalaqallāhu sab'a samāwātin ṭibāqā(n).
verses.translation: Ужель не видите вы, как Аллах Построил семь небес рядами

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَعَلَ ٱلْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَجَعَلَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13957'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقَمَرَ فِيهِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ نُو<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13958'>رًا و</tajweed>َجَعَلَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13959'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>شَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ja'alal-qamara fīhinna nūraw wa ja'alasy-syamsa sirājā(n).
verses.translation: Меж ними свет луны пролил И солнце в качестве светильника поставил

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ أَ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':13960'>نۢب</tajweed>َتَك<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':13961'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1579'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wallāhu ambatakum minal-arḍi nabātā(n).
verses.translation: Аллах взрастил вас из земли растеньем

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ṡumma yu'īdukum fīhā wa yukhrijukum ikhrājā(n).
verses.translation: И вновь в нее вас возвратит, И вновь вас изведет оттуда

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':87'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wallāhu ja'ala lakumul-arḍa bisāṭā(n).
verses.translation: Аллах ковром вам землю постелил

verses.text_uthmani: لِّتَسْلُكُوا۟ مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لِّتَسْلُكُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مِنْهَا سُبُل<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13962'>اً ف</tajweed>ِجَاجًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Litaslukū minhā subulan fijājā(n).
verses.translation: Чтоб вы по ней просторными дорогами ходили

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِى وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَالَ نُو<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13963'>حٌ ر</tajweed>َّبِّ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ عَصَوْنِى وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2433'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّبَعُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> م<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11941'>َن ل</tajweed>َّمْ يَزِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13964'>دْ</tajweed>هُ مَالُهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> وَوَلَدُهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ</tajweed> إِلَّا خَسَارًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qāla nūḥur rabbi innahum 'aṣaunī wattaba'ū mal lam yazidhu māluhū wa waladuhū illā khasārā(n).
verses.translation: И Нух сказал: "О мой Господь! Меня ослушались они и устремилися за теми, Чьи достояния и дети лишь отягчают их потери

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَكَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مَكْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13965'>رًا ك</tajweed>ُبَّارًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa makarū makran kubbārā(n).
verses.translation: И хитрость (тяжкую) задумали они

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقَالُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> لَا تَذَرُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ وَد<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13966'>ًّا و</tajweed>َلَا سُوَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13967'>عًا و</tajweed>َلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qālū lā tażarunna ālihatakum wa lā tażarunna waddaw wa lā suwā'ā(n), wa lā yagūṡa wa ya'ūqa wa nasrā(n).
verses.translation: (Друг другу) говоря: "Вы никаких богов своих не оставляйте: Ни Вадда, ни Совага, ни Йагуса, ни Йаука и ни Насра

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا۟ كَثِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَـٰلًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':387'>دْ</tajweed> أَضَلُّو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> كَثِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13968'>رًا‌ۖ و</tajweed>َلَا تَزِدِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13969'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>ظَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لاً
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qad aḍallū kaṡīrā(n), wa lā tazidiẓ-ẓālimīna illā ḍalālā(n).
verses.translation: Они с пути уж многих сбили. И злотворящим ничего не прибавляй, А только (углуби) их заблужденье

verses.text_uthmani: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٔـٰتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا۟ فَأُدْخِلُوا۟ نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا۟ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مِّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا خَط<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِيٓ</tajweed>ـَٔ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِهِمْ أُغْرِقُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فَأُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13970'>دْ</tajweed>خِلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> نَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13971'>رًا ف</tajweed>َلَمْ يَجِدُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> لَه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':1812'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':107'>ن د</tajweed>ُونِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':108'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13972'>نص</tajweed>َارًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Mimmā khaṭī'ātihim ugriqū fa'udkhilū nārā(n), falam yajidū lahum min dūnillāhi anṣārā(n).
verses.translation: За их грехи они потоплены и введены в Огонь - И не нашли себе иного покровителя, опричь Аллаха

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقَالَ نُو<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13963'>حٌ ر</tajweed>َّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7958'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':182'>ٱ</tajweed>لْكَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>فِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qāla nūḥur rabbi lā tażar 'alal-arḍi minal-kāfirīna dayyārā(n).
verses.translation: И Нух сказал: "О мой Господь! Не сохрани на сей земле (под кровом) Ни одного (упрямого) неверца

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا۟ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكَ إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13973'>ن ت</tajweed>َذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِد<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِلَّا فَاجِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13974'>رًا ك</tajweed>َفَّارًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innaka in tażarhum yuḍillū 'ibādaka wa lā yalidū illā fājiran kaffārā(n).
verses.translation: Коль Ты оставишь хоть кого-нибудь из них, Они в Твоих служителях посеют смуту И никого не смогут породить, Кроме неверных и распутных

verses.text_uthmani: رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَلِوَٰلِدَىَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِىَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًۢا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: رَّبِّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':5032'>ٱ</tajweed>غْفِرْ لِى وَلِو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِدَىَّ وَلِمَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13975'>ن د</tajweed>َخَلَ بَيْتِىَ مُؤْمِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13976'>نًا و</tajweed>َلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':5718'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُؤْمِنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِ وَلَا تَزِدِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13969'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>ظَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارَۢا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Rabbigfir lī wa liwālidayya wa liman dakhala baitiya  mu'minaw wa lil-mu'minīna wal-mu'mināt(i), wa lā tazidiẓ-ẓālimīna illā tabārā(n).
verses.translation: О мой Господь! Прости моим родителям и мне И всем, кто в дом мой верующим вступит, Всем верующим девам и мужам. Но злотворящим ничего не прибавляй, а погуби их
